                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/codingtea/p/19053136" title="发布于 2025-08-22 17:03">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">15分钟速通yolo12，从环境搭建到推理图片，最后训练自己的数据集</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 id="项目演示视频"><strong>项目演示视频：</strong></h2>
https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV127YXz4Eto/<br>
<p><span data-cke-copybin-start="1"><span data-cke-copybin-start="1">​</span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 2em">1 环境搭建</span></p>
<h2 id="1.1%20python%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85">1.1 python安装</h2>
<p>python我们这里使用了3.10，python的下载地址：<span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_csdnlink cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="a" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="28" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><a class="cke_widget_editable cke_widget_element" title="Python Release Python 3.10.11 | Python.org" href="https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-31011/" data-cke-enter-mode="2" data-cke-saved-href="https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-31011/" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fwww.python.org%2Fdownloads%2Frelease%2Fpython-31011%2F%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Python%20Release%20Python%203.10.11%20%7C%20Python.org%22%2C%22desc%22%3A%22The%20official%20home%20of%20the%20Python%20Programming%20Language%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22isCard%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasResquest%22%3Atrue%2C%22iconDefault%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22dCrQ0b-1755851816544%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-editable="text" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-link-desc="The official home of the Python Programming Language" data-link-icon="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blog_editor_html/release2.4.1/ckeditor/plugins/CsdnLink/icons/icon-default.png?t=P758" data-link-title="Python Release Python 3.10.11 | Python.org" data-widget="csdnlink" rel="noopener nofollow">Python Release Python 3.10.11 | Python.org</a>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>双击运行python安装包，执行安装流程，记得勾选环境变量。</p>
<p><span data-cke-copybin-start="1">​<span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_focused cke_widget_selected" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-widget-id="27"><img alt="" width="1590" height="972" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/07586459d42f44e29b204d0f7d286223.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F07586459d42f44e29b204d0f7d286223.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221590%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22972%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/07586459d42f44e29b204d0f7d286223.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" title="点击并拖拽以移动" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​</span></span></span></span></p>
<h2 id="1.2%20VsCode%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85">1.2 VsCode安装</h2>
<p>我们编写python代码使用的ide环境是vscode，当然使用pycharm也是没问题的。</p>
<p>vscode的下载地址：<span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_csdnlink cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="a" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="26" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><a class="cke_widget_editable cke_widget_element" title="Visual Studio Code - Code Editing. Redefined" href="https://code.visualstudio.com/" data-cke-enter-mode="2" data-cke-saved-href="https://code.visualstudio.com/" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcode.visualstudio.com%2F%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Visual%20Studio%20Code%20-%20Code%20Editing.%20Redefined%22%2C%22desc%22%3A%22Visual%20Studio%20Code%20redefines%20AI-powered%20coding%20with%20GitHub%20Copilot%20for%20building%20and%20debugging%20modern%20web%20and%20cloud%20applications.%20Visual%20Studio%20Code%20is%20free%20and%20available%20on%20your%20favorite%20platform%20-%20Linux%2C%20macOS%2C%20and%20Windows.%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22isCard%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasResquest%22%3Atrue%2C%22iconDefault%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22qZadaF-1755851816544%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-editable="text" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-link-desc="Visual Studio Code redefines AI-powered coding with GitHub Copilot for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications. Visual Studio Code is free and available on your favorite platform - Linux, macOS, and Windows." data-link-icon="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blog_editor_html/release2.4.1/ckeditor/plugins/CsdnLink/icons/icon-default.png?t=P758" data-link-title="Visual Studio Code - Code Editing. Redefined" data-widget="csdnlink" rel="noopener nofollow">Visual Studio Code - Code Editing. Redefined</a></span></p>
<p>根据安装提示安装即可：</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="25" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="1406" height="982" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/602c41d0f79d492b978e08cb59433a22.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F602c41d0f79d492b978e08cb59433a22.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221406%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22982%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/602c41d0f79d492b978e08cb59433a22.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<h2 id="1.3%20Yolo%E6%A1%86%E6%9E%B6%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81">1.3 Yolo框架代码</h2>
<p>yolo官网github网址：<span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_csdnlink cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="a" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="24" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><a class="cke_widget_editable cke_widget_element" title="https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics" href="https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics" data-cke-enter-mode="2" data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fultralytics%2Fultralytics%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fultralytics%2Fultralytics%22%2C%22desc%22%3A%22%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22isCard%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasResquest%22%3Atrue%2C%22iconDefault%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22pqzKu3-1755851816544%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-editable="text" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-link-icon="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blog_editor_html/release2.4.1/ckeditor/plugins/CsdnLink/icons/icon-default.png?t=P758" data-link-title="https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics" data-widget="csdnlink" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics</a></span></p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="23" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/de316efc08b54e1bb85f2f93117a56d5.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fde316efc08b54e1bb85f2f93117a56d5.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/de316efc08b54e1bb85f2f93117a56d5.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>我们提前电脑上新建一个存放我们工程的文件夹。</p>
<p>解压代码后，把框架代码中的ultralytics文件夹放到我们的工程文件夹中。</p>
<h2 id="1.4%20%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%BDYolo12%E7%9A%84%E6%9D%83%E9%87%8D%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6">1.4 下载Yolo12的权重文件</h2>
<p>打开yolo的官网网站：<span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_csdnlink cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="a" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="22" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><a class="cke_widget_editable cke_widget_element" title="主页 - Ultralytics YOLO 文档" href="https://docs.ultralytics.com/zh/" data-cke-enter-mode="2" data-cke-saved-href="https://docs.ultralytics.com/zh/" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.ultralytics.com%2Fzh%2F%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%E4%B8%BB%E9%A1%B5%20-%20Ultralytics%20YOLO%20%E6%96%87%E6%A1%A3%22%2C%22desc%22%3A%22%E6%8E%A2%E7%B4%A2%20Ultralytics%20YOLO%20-%20%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84%E5%AE%9E%E6%97%B6%E5%AF%B9%E8%B1%A1%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BE%E5%83%8F%E5%88%86%E5%89%B2%E6%8A%80%E6%9C%AF%E3%80%82%E4%BA%86%E8%A7%A3%E5%85%B6%E5%8A%9F%E8%83%BD%EF%BC%8C%E5%B9%B6%E5%9C%A8%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%AD%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E9%99%90%E5%BA%A6%E5%9C%B0%E5%8F%91%E6%8C%A5%E5%85%B6%E6%BD%9C%E5%8A%9B%E3%80%82%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22isCard%22%3Afalse%2C%22hasResquest%22%3Atrue%2C%22iconDefault%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fcsdnimg.cn%2Frelease%2Fblog_editor_html%2Frelease2.4.1%2Fckeditor%2Fplugins%2FCsdnLink%2Ficons%2Ficon-default.png%3Ft%3DP758%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22Ux3WBl-1755851816544%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-editable="text" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-link-desc="探索 Ultralytics YOLO - 最新的实时对象检测和图像分割技术。了解其功能，并在您的项目中最大限度地发挥其潜力。" data-link-icon="https://csdnimg.cn/release/blog_editor_html/release2.4.1/ckeditor/plugins/CsdnLink/icons/icon-default.png?t=P758" data-link-title="主页 - Ultralytics YOLO 文档" data-widget="csdnlink" rel="noopener nofollow">主页 - Ultralytics YOLO 文档</a></span></p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="21" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="3002" height="1490" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/747ee06462db4205b6ff22420462f53e.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F747ee06462db4205b6ff22420462f53e.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%223002%22%2C%22height%22%3A%221490%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/747ee06462db4205b6ff22420462f53e.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>点击“模型页面”后，再点击左侧的“YOLO12”菜单</p>
<p>页面下滑后，找到YOLO12n，点击后下载yolo12n的权重文件，将权重文件存放到工程文件夹的根目录里。</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="20" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="1770" height="1296" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/d58aa08df31846e3a4e1c362fdbd04c9.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fd58aa08df31846e3a4e1c362fdbd04c9.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221770%22%2C%22height%22%3A%221296%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/d58aa08df31846e3a4e1c362fdbd04c9.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<h2 id="1.5%20pip%E4%BE%9D%E8%B5%96%E4%B8%8B%E8%BD%BD">1.5 pip依赖下载</h2>
<p>先验证下python和pip是否安装并配置成功，运行cmd后，依次输入python和pip，检查是否有信息正确输出，如下图所示。</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="19" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="1720" height="366" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/bb330c36ea6f4b919447277193d35c41.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fbb330c36ea6f4b919447277193d35c41.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221720%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22366%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/bb330c36ea6f4b919447277193d35c41.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="18" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="1482" height="908" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/6e52aac9f93547a3afe051f25eba4f02.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F6e52aac9f93547a3afe051f25eba4f02.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221482%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22908%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/6e52aac9f93547a3afe051f25eba4f02.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>如果已经安装过了python后，输入python或者pip没有输出相关信息，则大概率是因为环境变量没有配置好，自行检查下环境变量问题，本文这里不对这个问题进一步展开叙述。</p>
<p>然后cmd通过cd命令把工作目录切换到之前所创建的工程目录的根目录下，创建虚拟环境，输入：</p>
<div class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_block cke_widget_codeSnippet cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="代码段" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="17" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1">
<pre class="cke_widget_element highlighter-hljs" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22code%22%3A%22python%20-m%20venv%20myyolo12%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="codeSnippet"><code>python -m venv myyolo12</code></pre>
<span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"></span></div>
<p>创建之后我们进一步通过cd命令进入虚拟环境下的mylolo12/Scripts目录下</p>
<p>命令行中输入activate，激活虚拟环境，如果命令行前面出现小括号括起来的（myyolo12），则表明虚拟环境激活成功</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="16" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/08c1ef6ab34b46629f71083a811a9c83.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F08c1ef6ab34b46629f71083a811a9c83.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/08c1ef6ab34b46629f71083a811a9c83.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>激活成功后在通过cd命令切换回到工程目录的根目录下。</p>
<p>然后可以通过pip命令来安装所依赖的插件，输入：</p>
<div class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_block cke_widget_codeSnippet cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="代码段" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="15" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1">
<pre class="cke_widget_element highlighter-hljs" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22code%22%3A%22pip%20install%20ultralytics%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="codeSnippet"><code>pip install ultralytics</code></pre>
<span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"></span></div>
<p>经过一段时间的等待，速度取决于网络情况，最终安装完所需要的插件。</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="14" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/efc2ea5e7723453397b322f0b405eea6.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fefc2ea5e7723453397b322f0b405eea6.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/efc2ea5e7723453397b322f0b405eea6.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<h2 id="1.6%20vscode%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85python%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6">1.6 vscode安装python插件</h2>
<p>在vscode的扩展中，搜索python，找到python插件后，点击右侧的安装按钮。</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="13" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/0b3e30bd53d24466817b3ba96164039f.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F0b3e30bd53d24466817b3ba96164039f.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/0b3e30bd53d24466817b3ba96164039f.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<h1 id="2%20%E5%9B%BE%E7%89%87%E9%A2%84%E6%B5%8B">2 图片预测</h1>
<p>这里用yolo框架中提供的两张图像作为测试图像，测试图像存放于ultralytics/assets下的bus.jpg和zidane.jpg</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="12" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/55d47ac9a8c347d7a98e5dc18ba6e5bb.jpeg" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F55d47ac9a8c347d7a98e5dc18ba6e5bb.jpeg%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/55d47ac9a8c347d7a98e5dc18ba6e5bb.jpeg"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="11" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/934ed10ff03c455fb067119432648f0a.jpeg" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F934ed10ff03c455fb067119432648f0a.jpeg%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/934ed10ff03c455fb067119432648f0a.jpeg"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>图像预测的代码：</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div class="cnblogs_Highlighter">
<pre class="brush:python;gutter:true;">from ultralytics import YOLO
import cv2

img = cv2.imread("zidane.jpg")

#初始化模型
model = YOLO("yolo12n.pt")

#预测
results = model.predict(img)

#提取检测结果的图像
results_image = results[0].plot()

#展示检测结果图像
cv2.imshow("YOLOv12n Detection", results_image)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()
</pre>
</div>
<p>　　</p>
<div class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_block cke_widget_codeSnippet cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="代码段" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="10" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"></span></div>
<p>代码并不复杂，先读取图像，然后初始化yolo模型，初始化模型中载入我们前面下载的yolo12的权重文件，然后调用predict进行图像预测，然后拿到预测的结果进行展示。</p>
<p>检测结果如下：</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="9" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/e6ddd40c719b4c04b2aaa670972f2e1d.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fe6ddd40c719b4c04b2aaa670972f2e1d.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/e6ddd40c719b4c04b2aaa670972f2e1d.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="8" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/9a94081afab34d4f8e1efca93a186402.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F9a94081afab34d4f8e1efca93a186402.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/9a94081afab34d4f8e1efca93a186402.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<h1 id="3%20%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E9%9B%86%E8%AE%AD%E7%BB%83">3 训练自己的数据集</h1>
<h2 id="3.1%20%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E9%9B%86%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D">3.1 数据集介绍</h2>
<p>数据集是检测石头、剪刀、布的手势，如下图所示。</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="7" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/2342833e3f1b44d6a6f49e2d96e3db29.gif" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F2342833e3f1b44d6a6f49e2d96e3db29.gif%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/2342833e3f1b44d6a6f49e2d96e3db29.gif"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>数据集分为：训练集、验证集、测试集，每个种类的数据集都有对应的图像和标注文件</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="6" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="1822" height="1040" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/7b05b933aec44c2c981e2873afad0199.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2F7b05b933aec44c2c981e2873afad0199.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221822%22%2C%22height%22%3A%221040%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/7b05b933aec44c2c981e2873afad0199.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>标注文件</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="5" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" width="1814" height="1050" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/af07f9dfdb2b466a86ef3339aae1e1b3.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Faf07f9dfdb2b466a86ef3339aae1e1b3.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%221814%22%2C%22height%22%3A%221050%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/af07f9dfdb2b466a86ef3339aae1e1b3.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>训练集有6455张图像</p>
<p>验证集有576张图像</p>
<p>测试集有304张图像</p>
<p>下面是数据集的yaml文件信息</p>
<div class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_block cke_widget_codeSnippet cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="代码段" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="4" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1">
<div class="cnblogs_Highlighter">
<pre class="brush:python;gutter:true;">train: train/images
val: valid/images
test: test/images

nc: 3
names: ['Paper', 'Rock', 'Scissors']
</pre>
</div>
<p>　　</p>
<span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"></span></div>
<p>将数据集和yaml文件复制到ultralytics/cfg/datasets目录下</p>
<h2 id="3.2%20%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E9%9B%86%E8%AE%AD%E7%BB%83">3.2 数据集训练</h2>
<p>数据集训练代码：</p>
<div class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_block cke_widget_codeSnippet cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="代码段" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="3" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1">
<div class="cnblogs_Highlighter">
<pre class="brush:python;gutter:true;">from ultralytics import YOLO

def main():
    # 载入yolo12的预训练权重文件
    model = YOLO("yolo12n.pt")
    # 调用训练函数
    model.train(
        data="data.yaml",    #数据集说明文件
        epochs=100,    #训练次数
        batch=16,    #训练批次
    )

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
</pre>
</div>
<p>　　</p>
<span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"></span></div>
<p>执行后，会进行训练，训练的速度取决于电脑的配置，也可以把代码托管到服务器上进行训练，具体方法本文不细展开。</p>
<p>训练过程如下</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="2" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/d27048b4c9154ce4a3419f308ad8acac.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fd27048b4c9154ce4a3419f308ad8acac.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/d27048b4c9154ce4a3419f308ad8acac.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>训练结束后，会在根目录的runs/detect下生成以train作为前缀的文件夹，里面保存了训练中产生的训练结果和最终产生的训练的权重文件。如下图所示</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="1" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/eb495a4630b446a78677f4e735407d69.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Feb495a4630b446a78677f4e735407d69.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/eb495a4630b446a78677f4e735407d69.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>里面的weights文件夹存放了权重文件</p>
<p><span class="cke_widget_wrapper cke_widget_inline cke_widget_image cke_image_nocaption cke_widget_selected" data-cke-display-name="图像" data-cke-filter="off" data-cke-widget-id="0" data-cke-widget-wrapper="1"><img alt="" class="cke_widget_element lazyload" data-cke-saved-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/c6feb3da7e6a4d2995503853784930cb.png" data-cke-widget-data="%7B%22hasCaption%22%3Afalse%2C%22src%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fi-blog.csdnimg.cn%2Fdirect%2Fc6feb3da7e6a4d2995503853784930cb.png%22%2C%22alt%22%3A%22%22%2C%22width%22%3A%22%22%2C%22height%22%3A%22%22%2C%22lock%22%3Atrue%2C%22align%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22classes%22%3Anull%7D" data-cke-widget-keep-attr="0" data-cke-widget-upcasted="1" data-widget="image" data-src="https://i-blog.csdnimg.cn/direct/c6feb3da7e6a4d2995503853784930cb.png"><span class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler_container"><img width="15" height="15" class="cke_reset cke_widget_drag_handler lazyload" data-cke-widget-drag-handler="1" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3687401/202508/3687401-20250822165457676-1808144825.gif"><span class="cke_image_resizer" title="点击并拖拽以改变尺寸">​<span class="cke_widget_edit_container" title="编辑图片"><br></span></span></span></span></p>
<p>其中:</p>
<p>best.pt表示训练过程中保存的训练效果最好的一次权重。</p>
<p>last.pt表示训练最后一次的训练结果的权重。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>以上就是我们从0到环境搭建，到图片预测，最终训练自己数据集的完整过程，中间细节难免有些疏漏，如有问题，可以评论区进行讨论。</p>
<p><span data-cke-copybin-start="1"><span data-cke-copybin-end="1">​</span></span></p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
